title: Greg LeMond hails cycling’s new wave: ‘It’s an exciting sport to watch’
content:
After years of questioning performances, triple yellow jersey is cautiously optimistic about cycling's newest stars: 'It’s been really exciting racing in the last couple of years.'

Read the full article at Greg LeMond hails cycling’s new wave: ‘It’s an exciting sport to watch’ on Velo.
